channel.title: Iris-Go on 简单的梦

item.title: Iris-Go学习笔记
item.description: 安装 错误1 开始学习Go-Iris框架，跟着文档走安装流程 go get github.com/kataras/iris 这一步时,却报错： cannot find package "github.com/russross/blackfriday/v2" in any of: D:\Go\src\github.com\russross\blackfriday\v2 (from $GOROOT) D:\workspace\goproject\src\github.com\russross\blackfriday\v2 (from $GOPATH) cannot find package "github.com/CloudyKit/jet/v4" in any of: D:\Go\src\github.com\CloudyKit\jet\v4 (from $GOROOT) D:\workspace\goproject\src\github.com\CloudyKit\jet\v4 (from $GOPATH) 解决方案 暂无
